title: Need help detecting this free-hand font from image
content:
Hi All.

I have this image and I would really like to know what the font is. I tried What the Font's website but they weren't near the right font...

Thank you

[http://tricom1.co.za/images/landingpage/welcomehead.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017160141/http:/tricom1.co.za/images/landingpage/welcomehead.jpg "http://tricom1.co.za/images/landingpage/welcomehead.jpg")
author: dextrousdave

comments.content:
If you don't get an answer here, you might try contacting their website developer, [http://www.jasper.co.za/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017160141/http:/www.jasper.co.za/ "http://www.jasper.co.za/")  
 - Herb
